Posts.Content: Mar 14, 2018 09:00AM UofAgirl wrote: Good morning I was on this site back in 2011 and am back again...sigh. Just found yesterday I’m going to need a mastectomy with delayed reconstruction so no nipple sparing and I’m scared to death. I am still in shock it’s back let alone having to go through this surgery. Did any of you have to wait before getting reconstruction done?
